remarks: The support of a tensor product of ring element families is contained in the product of the supports.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ evlslem4 as of 18-Jul-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
evlslem4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evlslem4.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
evlslem4.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
evlslem4.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
evlslem4.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> X e. B ) $.
evlslem4.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. J ) -> Y e. B ) $.
evlslem4OLD $p |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. I , y e. J |-> ( X .x. Y ) ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) C_ ( ( `' ( x e. I |-> X ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) X. ( `' ( y e. J |-> Y ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x y $.
